properties.name: server.address.nacos.server-addr
properties.description: nacos 服务器地址与端口(spring.cloud.nacos.[config|discovery].server-addr) 例：localhost:8848.

properties.name: server.address.sentinel.transport.port
properties.description: sentinel 管理端数据传输端口:20000; spring.cloud.sentinel.transport.port.

properties.name: server.address.sentinel.transport.dashboard
properties.description: sentinel 管理端地址与端口(spring.cloud.sentinel.transport.dashboard.) 例：localhost:8848

properties.name: server.address.datasource.server-addr
properties.description: 数据库服务器地址与端口:localhost:3306; spring.datasource.url.
